TopicTitle: KSP Got me into the best school in the country

Articles.Content:
Pre-note

I am already finishing 9th grade, and high school is pretty much around the corner. I wasn't happy with my current school since when I joined it 6 years back and went to 3rd grade(the moment I was born we went to live in the Ukraine, then we returned back to Latvia). My native language is Russian, but i am Latvian, and basically y current school was the only one that agreed to accept me under one condition:I had to learn Latvian from scratch in 3 months time. And so I did, and I got the best grade

Anyway my current school is Russian speaking(Latvia is divided between the Russian camp and the Latvian camp), but despite that some subjects are forced to be in Latvian. The number one school in the country is fully Latvian, but what attracted me is that if i join the IB program, I get to study in English for the last 2 years of high school(3 years of high school in Latvia). However, there is that year of full Latvian.

Anyway, I started prepping for the entrance exam that just had to happen on my mother's birthday

It was the most stressful year of my life, and KSP was the only thing keeping me sane. I sat the exam, and then I had to wait 3 days for results.

3 days without sleep, but once again KSP kept me sane

Thankfully, all was re-payed, and believe it or not, but I was accepted! (81/85 score, minimum required was 69/85)

Also, my friend got accepted too, and he loves KSP too, it's a win-win.

Thank you SQUAD for the best stress-relief game in the world.
I'm very happy for you. Keep up the good work and I wish you continued success!
Well, that's fantastic for you! I also find some relieving effects in blowing stuff up

I can assure that there are many adults twice your age that do not write English as a first language as well as you do as a third.

Congratulations!

Wow, congrats!

I hope your studies go well at your new school.

Thanks a lot guys! I still have to pass another entrance test in English so ican join the IB program in one year, wish me luck! I also have the choice of selecting which language I want to be as my third(French, German). I already know German, but I also want to continue learning French.

Thankfully everything is going smooth in KSP and finally getting a space station around Laythe is one of my best achievements. If something goes whack on a mission ,I just quickly take a few SRB's and shoot a probe into interstellar space
A round of applause for both IDan and Squad for the amazing game
